metadata.title: Pacific Ocean Perch Bottom Trawl Survey of the Queen Charlotte Sound, BC, Canada

creators.name: Ocean Canada - Pacific Region, Pacific Biological Station

metadata.description:
Catch data consists of Pacific ocean perch.  Sampling period is between June and September using bottom trawl (roller gear) with bottom depth range of 100-400 m.  

[ Reference: PICES Scientific Report No. 18 2001, Proceedings of the PICES/CoML/IPRC Workshop on "Impact of Climate Variability on Observation and Prediction of Ecosystem and Biodiversity Changes in the North Pacific", http://www.pices.int/publications/scientific_reports/Report18/default.aspx. ]
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To index the abundance of exploited species and to study multispecies groundfish assemblages.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Unknown
